text: Ndemupelila Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah (born 29 October 1952) is a Namibian politician who is the president-elect of Namibia after winning the 2024 presidential election. She is set to be Namibia's fifth president and first woman to hold this position. She is the third vice-president of Namibia since February 2024. == Life == Netumbo Nandi was born on 29 October 1952 in Onamutai, South West Africa (now Namibia). Her parents were Justina Nekoto Shaduka-Nandi and Petrus Nandi. Her father was a priest in the Anglican Church. She was the ninth of 13 children. She went to school at St. Mary's Mission in Odibo. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Namibian politicians Category:Vice presidents
title: Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah
